mapper.sql: id, case_name, case_title, priority, test_mode, module_id, test_conditions, detail_steps, expected_result, actual_result_id, bug_id, remarks, project_id, version_id, create_time, del_time, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into cm_casedetail (id, case_name, case_title, priority, test_mode, module_id, test_conditions, detail_steps, expected_result, actual_result_id, bug_id, remarks, project_id, version_id, create_time, del_time, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{testMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{testConditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailSteps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bugId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update cm_casedetail
case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_title = #{caseTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=CHAR},
test_mode = #{testMode,jdbcType=CHAR},
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
test_conditions = #{testConditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_steps = #{detailSteps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expected_result = #{expectedResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actual_result_id = #{actualResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bug_id = #{bugId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cm_casedetail set case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_title = #{caseTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=CHAR}, test_mode = #{testMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, test_conditions = #{testConditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_steps = #{detailSteps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expected_result = #{expectedResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actual_result_id = #{actualResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bug_id = #{bugId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from cm_casedetail where del_flag = '0' and case_name = #{caseName}

SELECT case_name as caseName, case_title as caseTitle, CASE priority WHEN '0' THEN '低' WHEN '1' THEN '中' WHEN '2' THEN '高' ELSE '其他' END AS priority, CASE test_mode WHEN '0' THEN '手动' WHEN '1' THEN '自动' ELSE '其他' END AS testMode, module_name AS moduleName, test_conditions AS testConditions, detail_steps AS detailSteps, expected_result AS expectedResult, actual_result AS actualResult, bug_id AS bugId, remarks as remarks FROM cm_casedetail c LEFT JOIN cm_module m ON c.module_id = m.id LEFT JOIN cm_actual_result ar ON ar.id = c.actual_result_id WHERE c.del_flag = '0' AND m.del_flag = '0' and c.id= #{id}
mapper.update: update cm_casedetail set del_flag = '1',del_time = NOW() where id = #{id}
